Name: Arcadia (XPH 793)
Characteristics: very early Napa type Chinese cabbage.

Name: Banko
Characteristics: F1 hybrid with excellent bolt tolerance; tall, narrow, cylindrical shaped heads.

Name: Burpee Hybrid
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, giant cylindrical heads, broad and tightly folded; heavily savoyed, thick, succulent leaves.

Name: Chiko
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, Chinese cabbage type, early, narrow cylindrical, vigorous tall.

Name: China Express
Characteristics: early hybrid, slow-bolting Napa type, barrel-shaped, well wrapped, uniform.

Name: Jade Pagoda
Characteristics: F1 hybrid that tolerates cold and is slow to bolt; dark green and crisp.

Name: Joi Choi
Characteristics: F1 hybrid with 45-day maturity, white stems and dark green leaves.

Name: Magica (XPH 791)
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, round top head, good field holding and shipping quality.

Name: Mandarin
Characteristics: more uniform and sure heading than Wong Bok.

Name: Manoko
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, bolt tolerant, medium green, compact, dense heads.

Name: Marquis
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, Chinese cabbage type, early, holds well, bright green.

Name: Michihli
Characteristics: more uniform and sure heading than Chihli.
Adaptation: northern half of the United States for July planting.

Name: Optika
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, Chinese cabbage type, barrel shaped, vigorous, Napa type.

Name: T-652
Characteristics: F1 hybrid, Chinese cabbage type, slow bolting, upright, holds well.
Resistance: virus, soft rot, alternaria; tolerance to some club root races.

Name: Zen
Characteristics: a cross between a chinese cabbage and an oriental green cultivar (not a geneticaly modified organism); heat resistant; vigorous growth year around and in any area, even in the summer; harvest 35 days after sowing; thick, green leaf; tender and soft like Komatsuha (Japanese spinach); moderately sweet like cabbage.
